roleset.name: transfer data from one computer to another

example.name: Transitive
example.text: ...The Chinese-language search engine "Yam" helps parents download filtering software that can block access to obscene materials online.

example.name: With Storage device
example.text: John helped Mary-1 *-1 download videos onto her cell phone.
